content: learn granny squares on this fun small project featuring crochet earrings stitched in aunt lydia s crochet thread classic 10 tiny granny squares are linked with a crochet circle to create a hot summertime look that s light and comfortable learn single_crochet crochet in rounds double_crochet half_double_crochet and more explore color to create a distinctive ensemble to complement all your looks materials aunt lydia s® crochet thread classic™ 10 white & natural 400 yds/365 76 m colors 300 yds/274 32 m contrast a maize 0423 1 ball contrast b frosty green 0661 1 ball contrast c ecru 0419 1 ball measurement approximately 2½ 6 cm long excluding earring wire
